body: Help, my google chrome was working like 20 min ago at school D: when I got back It wasn't working, I checked if it was allowed on firewall since this happened before (it was) I removed it from firewall and put it back and it still didn't work. And if you guys are wondering I am on internet explorer right now. So I know its something wrong with google chrome...Here is what it sayshttp://i.imgur.com/Ai1O8qG.jpg

title: Google Chrome Help. [resolved]
